message.body: How'd the flight go? We had sooo much fun with you guys! Avery was crying on the way home because she already missed you guys so much! I'm lame, I had yo
ur $$ in my purse. I put it in the mail! Love you guys
Yeah it was so much fun. Trip back was good. Coop slept most of the flight. Got home and he slept from 9 to 4. Had to wake him at 4 too.
Its aunt love my pic of kabobs. Still can't belive that hot lava from magic show. I was scared!
